• HTML5 browser game with real-time multiplayer using MQTT/WebSockets
  • Mobile-optimized with virtual D-pad and action buttons
  • Procedural voxel-style mining with over 20 block types
  • Persistent progression system with upgrades, inventory, and shop
  • Cloud save integration via PuterFS with conflict resolution

Mega Miner Online is a browser-based multiplayer mining game featuring real-time WebSocket connectivity, mobile controls, and persistent progression. Players explore procedurally generated underground worlds, mine various ores, upgrade their equipment, and trade resources with others. The game includes a comprehensive save system with cloud synchronization, an in-game shop for upgrades and consumables, and a dynamic day/night cycle with weather effects.
